Class GDrawing

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--Drawing
        |
        +--GDrawing
public class GDrawing
extends Drawing

Extends class Drawing to support bitmapped drawings.

Version:
1.0 -- March 7, 1999
Author:
C. Vickery
